entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , McBride
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
